pkgmetadata.longdescription: rdb to csvThis is a tool to convert rdb to csv. rdb is the output file format by redis (http://redis.io/).Use redis-rdb-tools (https://github.com/sripathikrishnan/redis-rdb-tools) for parsing rdb fileProgressredis-Strings(http://redis.io/commands#string) and redis-Hashes (http://redis.io/commands#hash) have been implemented.
